name: infoEnergy Nexus
body:
### Welcome to the infoEnergy Nexus
We are a working group at [the University of California, Berkeley](www.berkeley.edu) who focus on the transformative role of information technology on modern energy systems.  The group shares knowledge and builds tools together, and is mostly made up of students who are working on our 'own' projects. 

```
we will be sharing code :)
```



### Schedule
We meet every other week at the D-Lab.  

### More to come...
I need to head out...more to come soon.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
